title: [Gyldemar Forest, Blasted Heath]
description: Nothing grows at all in this desolate expanse of ash, and even the twisted trees that hid the wasteland from view seem healthy by comparison.  The powder-fine grey ash swirls and eddies around you, though not even a faint breeze stirs the close air.

Nothing grows at all in this desolate expanse of ash, and even the twisted trees that hid the wasteland from view seem healthy by comparison.  The powder-fine grey ash swirls and eddies around you, though not even a faint breeze stirs the stillness of the nighttime close air.  Although the area looks scorched, there is none of the sharp charred scent that normally accompanies a forest fire.
